summary.purpose: TypeScript type definitions for the table module: the main TableProps configuration interface, the TableProviderType context shape, the UseFilterProps hook input, the FilterProps component props, and the internal FilterableColumn interface.
summary.problem_solved: Centralises all type contracts for the table system so that the Table component, its sub-components, and its hooks share a single source of truth for prop shapes and state types.

symbols.name: FilterableColumn
symbols.signature: { header: string; dataKey: string; ui?: (value: any) => ReactNode }
symbols.description: Internal (non-exported) interface describing a filterable column definition: the display header, the data key to filter on, and an optional UI renderer for filter option display.

symbols.name: TableProviderType
symbols.signature: { sortColumn: number; sortOrder: 'asc' | 'desc'; handleSort: (columnIndex: number) => void; searchQuery: string; deferredSearchQuery: string; handleSearch: (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => void; dataToRender: { renderedData: TObject<any>[]; filtered: TObject<any>[] }; filters: TObject<string[]>; filterPopupsDisplay: string; filterOptions: any; handleFilterChange: (dataKey: string, value: string) => void; handleFilterClick: (dataKey: string) => void; closeFilterWindow: () => void; displayAllRows: boolean; setDisplayAllRows: (value: boolean) => void; clearFilter: () => void }
symbols.description: Interface describing the dynamic state and handler functions that the TableProvider injects into the TableContext. Includes sort state, search state, filter state, the computed dataToRender, display-all toggle, and all corresponding handler functions.

symbols.name: UseFilterProps
symbols.description: Input props interface for the useFilter hook: the source data array and the list of filterable column definitions.

symbols.name: TableProps
symbols.signature: { data, headers, keysToRender, optionalElement?, containerStyle?, containerClassName?, containerHeaderClassName?, includeSearch?, autoFocus?, searchInputStyle?, searchInputClassName?, searchContainerClassName?, tableContainerStyle?, tableContainerClass?, tableStyle?, tableBodyClassName?, rowStyles?, rowClassName?, headerStyle?, headerClassName?, headerCellStyle?, headerCellClassName?, cellStyle?, cellClassName?, filterableColumns?, sortKeys?, exportToExcelKeys?, excelFileName?, excelHeadline?, exportExcelContent?, exportToExcelClassName?, dataToAddToExcelTable?, sumColumns?, searchPlaceHolder?, summaryContainerStyle?, summaryLabelStyle?, summaryRowStyle?, summaryLabel?, filterLabel?, sortLabel?, exportExcelTitle?, onRowClick?, direction?, maxRows?, maxRowsLabel1?, maxRowsLabel2?, showDisplayAllRowsButton?, displayAllRowsButtonProps?, displayAllRowsButtonLabel?, maxRowsContainerClassName?, zebraStriping?, selectedRow?, rowClassNameFunction?, noneSearchKeys? }
symbols.description: The main configuration interface for the Table component. Includes required data/headers/keysToRender, and extensive optional props for: styling (container, table, header, row, cell), search (input style, placeholder, autofocus, excluded keys), sorting (sortKeys, sortLabel), filtering (filterableColumns, filterLabel), Excel export (keys, filename, headline, extra data, summary), summary/totals (sumColumns, labels, styles), pagination (maxRows, display-all toggle), row interaction (onRowClick, selectedRow, zebraStriping, rowClassNameFunction), and layout direction (ltr/rtl).

members.name: data
members.description: The array of data objects to render in the table.

members.name: headers
members.description: Column header labels to display in the table head.

members.name: keysToRender
members.description: Object keys to render as cell values, in column order.

members.name: optionalElement
members.description: An optional custom ReactNode to render in the table toolbar area.

members.name: onRowClick
members.description: Callback invoked when a row is clicked, receiving the row data and index.

members.name: includeSearch
members.description: Whether to show the search input in the toolbar.

members.name: sortKeys
members.description: Array of data keys corresponding to columns that are sortable.

members.name: filterableColumns
members.description: Array of column definitions that support filtering.

members.name: exportToExcelKeys
members.description: Data keys to include in Excel export. Presence enables the export button.

members.name: sumColumns
members.type: { label: string; dataKey: string; ui?: (value: any) => ReactNode }[]
members.description: Columns to compute and display sum totals for in the summary footer.

members.name: maxRows
members.description: Maximum number of rows to display at once. Defaults to data.length.

members.name: showDisplayAllRowsButton
members.description: Whether to show a button to toggle between limited and all rows.

members.name: zebraStriping
members.description: Zebra-striping configuration with separate CSS classes for odd and even rows.

members.name: selectedRow
members.type: { className?: string; rowIndex?: number | null; onChange?: (rowIndex: number) => void }
members.description: Configuration for visually highlighting a selected row and tracking selection changes.

members.name: rowClassNameFunction
members.description: Function that returns a CSS class name based on row data for dynamic row styling.

members.name: noneSearchKeys
members.description: Keys to exclude from search matching.

symbols.name: FilterProps
symbols.description: Props interface for the Filter component: the column index in the headers array and the FilterableColumn definition.
